items.sentence: I\'m sorry, but I don\'t understand French well.
I\'m sorry. I should\'ve called you back sooner.
The police officer put handcuffs on the suspect.
The roof collapsed under the weight of the snow.
The room was so quiet you could hear a pin drop.
The school principal called Tom into his office.
Would you want to know how you\'re going to die?
You already know about what Tom did, don\'t you?
Tom studied French for three hours this morning.
Tom took off his coat and threw it on the floor.
